sentences.en: Candidate: People who are honest, dedicate to their work and have integrity.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢和诚实的 、 对工作投入、为人正直的人一起工作.

sentences.en: Concentrate the natural elite, Dedicate to the Human Health.
sentences.cn: 浓缩植物精华, 缔造人类健康!

sentences.en: Dedicate a row and take it down to Bean's.
sentences.cn: 奉献出一排农作物,把果实送给豆子的咖啡屋.

sentences.en: Dedicate for small amount but many type items production.
sentences.cn: 机台设计专为少量多样生产,机动性高.

sentences.en: For the next few years, she dedicated herself to her work.
sentences.cn: 随后的几年里，她全身心地投入工作。

sentences.en: He felt that medicine was the most important cause to which he could dedicate himself.
sentences.cn: 他觉得医学是他能够为之献身的最重大的事业.

sentences.en: I can partition off any distracting emotions and dedicate them solely to this body.
sentences.cn: 我能隔绝任何干扰情绪,并把它们控制在这个身体里.

sentences.en: I dedicate the book to my inspirational teacher — Li Yang.
sentences.cn: 我现在要把这本书献给影响我终身的老师——李阳老师.

sentences.en: I dedicate the goal to those and dear to me.
sentences.cn: 我把这个进球送给那些我最亲爱的人.

sentences.en: I want to dedicate this song to her and say I'm sorry to her.
sentences.cn: 我想把这首歌献个她,想对她说对不起.

sentences.en: I would like to dedicate the song to my beloved wife.
sentences.cn: 我谨以此歌献给我的爱妻.

sentences.en: President Lincoln came from Washington to dedicate that cemetery.
sentences.cn: 林肯总统亲自从华盛顿前来为此墓地举行揭幕礼.

sentences.en: She dedicated her first album to Woody Allen, who she says understands her obsession.
sentences.cn: 她把她的第一张唱片献给伍迪·艾伦，她说艾伦理解她的痴迷。

sentences.en: She vowed to herself that she would dedicate her life to scientific studies.
sentences.cn: 她默默地发誓要献身于科学研究.

sentences.en: The actress now dedicates herself to children’s charity work.
sentences.cn: 这名女演员现在致力于儿童慈善工作。

sentences.en: Therefore, we should dedicate to control the rate of population growth.
sentences.cn: 所以我们现在更加应该控制人口的增长速度.

sentences.en: They promised that they would dedicate a song to both of us.
sentences.cn: 他们答应专门为我们姐妹俩作一首歌.

sentences.en: We only dedicate a birth life, then can get life.
sentences.cn: 我们只有献出生命, 才能得到生命.

words.tran_cn: 以…奉献；把…用于（dedicate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 献（身），致力，题献词，为…举行落成典礼
trans.tran_en: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing

trans.tran_cn: 题献词于…； 把…献给， 把用于
trans.tran_en: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing
